overview: In this film the author (Pavel Grinyov) talks about the gaming console Dandy, which was very popular in the Russian Federation in the 90 years of the late 20th century. In particular, the film is explained in detail about how there was also covered by the game console in Russia and pirate games, which have been distributed. Dandy had a logo in the form of a gray elephant, a curse word in this context means low-quality pirated games.
title: Curse of the Gray Elephant
